contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 25, 1945 D West of England Area (Second Section)
West of England Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest West Of England Area west-of-england-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) None West of England
Second
Test Piece Contest
Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
H.J. Packer's Recreation Ground, Whitehall, Bristol Brass Band News October 1945 shows result as - 1 Camborne, 2 Bristol Aero, 3 Kingswood, 4 Fishponds. Only 4 bands competed.
Feb. 6, 2011, 7:27 p.m. Feb. 17, 2017, 12:26 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band Telfer Rule
2 City of Bristol Brass Band J. Davis
3 Bristol Aeroplane Company Joseph Crawford Dyson
4 Kingswood Evangel W. Stanley Smith
